attributes.action: Give more funding towards mental health issues in England
attributes.additional_details: To look at and give more funding to mental health services, the crisis teams, cmht, bernados and many more like this
attributes.background: Mental health issues and suicides are high, even more so during this time of C-19, the services are not fit for purpose and need funding so everyone who needs it can be helped.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

Emergency funding increase for mental health services due to Covid -19 pandemic:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307724

More funding to ensure the safety of patients in the mental health system:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302995

Increase funding for NHS Adult Mental Health Services:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316023
